A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars Movie Ever... I'm a huge fan of all the material related to Star Wars\, this was a kick in the nuts in each aspect. I have a Top 5 that I can rescue from the movie\, and a Top 15 Why I hate this movie!\nThis is not a Star Wars Film\, this is something else\, and as something else maybe is not the worst film in story\, is an average film\, but as a Star Wars film is the worst in my opinion\, the director take a concept and try to create something new\, that is average\, but you can't take Star Wars and try to create something new\, in this I will say \"Do not\, there is no try\"
